main event: A security guard observed an unidentified flying object over the Naval Air Station, Key West, Florida, on 6 September 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as bright white and triangular in shape, 50-75 feet in diameter., It was hovering at an altitude of 3000-4000 feet for approximately 15 minutes., The object suddenly accelerated and departed at a speed estimated over 1500 mph., The sighting occurred around 2030 hours and was reported to the UFO Reporting Center., There was significant news interest around a photograph related to a sighting, prompting analysis requests from the Air Force.
